alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 3:22AM MST until February 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County
